content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: black_glazed_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "pillager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft black glazed terracotta, I need to first craft black terracotta, which requires placing 8 terracotta blocks in a + shape around a black dye. Therefore, I will start by moving one terracotta block from slot 22 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_glazed_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "pillager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Since there is already a terracotta block in slot 1, I will move another terracotta block to the right of it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 3 with quantity 1

act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 13 with quantity 1
